chapters.title: Chapter 30:  The Way of the Predator
chapters.info: Aan'allein, p. 523—Aiel name for Lan. It means “One Man,” “The Man Alone,” or “Man Who is an Entire People” in the Old Tongue. Lan's story is well-known and well-respected among the Aiel. The Man Alone is no longer alone. See Mandragoran, Lan.
